languages.text: "Мне тоже. Привычнее, когда есть приказ и план, а мои собеседники — цели, требующие устранения. Но иногда приходится терпеть вот такие периоды затишья".
"So do I. I'm more used to having orders and a plan of action — and elimination targets instead of interlocutors. But, every now and then, I have to suffer through these bouts of downtime."
languages.original_text: "Мне тоже. Привычнее, когда есть приказ и план, а мои собеседники — цели, требующие устранения. Но иногда приходится терпеть вот такие периоды затишья".

traits.locale_text: "So do I. I'm more used to having orders and a plan of action, and elimination targets instead of interlocutors. But every now and then I have to suffer through these bouts of downtime."
"So do I. I'm more used to having orders and a plan of action, and elimination targets instead of interlocutors. But every now and then I have to suffer through these bouts of downtime."
"So do I. I'm more used to having orders and a plan of action — and elimination targets instead of interlocutors. But, every now and then, I have to suffer through these bouts of downtime."
"So do I. I'm more used to having orders and a plan of action — and elimination targets instead of interlocutors. But, every now and then, I have to suffer through these bouts of downtime."
"So do I. I'm more used to having orders and a plan of action — and elimination targets instead of interlocutors. But, every now and then, I have to suffer through these bouts of downtime."
"So do I. I'm more used to having orders and a plan of action — and elimination targets instead of interlocutors. But, every now and then, I have to suffer through these bouts of downtime."

languages.text: 「私も同じです。普段は命令や行動計画があって、相手を会話する人間ではなく、排除すべき対象として扱う方が性に合っています。ですが時々、こうした手持ち無沙汰な時間に耐えなければならないこともあります」
languages.original_text: "So do I. I'm more used to having orders and a plan of action — and elimination targets instead of interlocutors. But, every now and then, I have to suffer through these bouts of downtime."

traits.locale_text: 「私も同じです。普段は命令や行動計画があって、相手を会話する人間ではなく、排除すべき対象として扱う方が性に合っています。ですが時々、こうした手持ち無沙汰な時間に耐えなければならないこともあります」

languages.text: "Ich auch. Ich bin daran gewöhnt, Befehle zu haben und einen Aktionsplan – und zu eliminierende Ziele statt Gesprächspartner. Aber hin und wieder muss ich leiden und diese Phasen der Untätigkeit durchstehen."
languages.original_text: "So do I. I'm more used to having orders and a plan of action — and elimination targets instead of interlocutors. But, every now and then, I have to suffer through these bouts of downtime."

traits.locale_text: "Ich auch. Ich bin daran gewöhnt, Befehle zu haben und einen Aktionsplan – und zu eliminierende Ziele statt Gesprächspartner. Aber hin und wieder muss ich leiden und diese Phasen der Untätigkeit durchstehen."

languages.text: « Moi aussi. Je suis plus habitué à exécuter des ordres, à suivre des plans d'action... et à avoir une cible à éliminer plutôt qu'{mf|un interlocuteur|une interlocutrice}. Mais de temps à autre, je dois m'accommoder de ces futiles temps libres.
languages.original_text: "So do I. I'm more used to having orders and a plan of action — and elimination targets instead of interlocutors. But, every now and then, I have to suffer through these bouts of downtime."

traits.locale_text: « Moi aussi. Je suis plus habitué à exécuter des ordres, à suivre des plans d'action... et à avoir une cible à éliminer plutôt qu'{mf|un interlocuteur|une interlocutrice}. Mais de temps à autre, je dois m'accommoder de ces futiles temps libres.

languages.text: «Yo también. Estoy más acostumbrado a tener órdenes y un plan de acción; también a eliminar objetivos en vez de interlocutores. Pero de vez en cuando he de padecer estos momentos ociosos».
languages.original_text: "So do I. I'm more used to having orders and a plan of action — and elimination targets instead of interlocutors. But, every now and then, I have to suffer through these bouts of downtime."

traits.locale_text: «Yo también. Estoy más acostumbrado a tener órdenes y un plan de acción; también a eliminar objetivos en vez de interlocutores. Pero de vez en cuando he de padecer estos momentos ociosos».

languages.text: “我也一样，我也不喜欢担任对话者的角色。我更喜欢按照命令执行计划，消灭目标。不过，每隔一段时间，我便不得不忍受这样的闲暇时光。”
languages.original_text: "So do I. I'm more used to having orders and a plan of action — and elimination targets instead of interlocutors. But, every now and then, I have to suffer through these bouts of downtime."

traits.locale_text: “我也一样，我也不喜欢担任对话者的角色。我更喜欢按照命令执行计划，消灭目标。不过，每隔一段时间，我便不得不忍受这样的闲暇时光。”

languages.text: "Ben de. Emirlere ve bir hareket planı olmasına, muhataplar yerine de yok edilecek hedefler olmasına çok alışkınım. Ancak arada sırada bu boş zaman nöbetlerine de katlanmak zorundayım."
languages.original_text: "So do I. I'm more used to having orders and a plan of action — and elimination targets instead of interlocutors. But, every now and then, I have to suffer through these bouts of downtime."

traits.locale_text: "Ben de. Emirlere ve bir hareket planı olmasına, muhataplar yerine de yok edilecek hedefler olmasına çok alışkınım. Ancak arada sırada bu boş zaman nöbetlerine de katlanmak zorundayım."

languages.original_text: "So do I. I'm more used to having orders and a plan of action — and elimination targets instead of interlocutors. But, every now and then, I have to suffer through these bouts of downtime."
